summary: REQ-10 appears to be addressed via CSS changes that adjust chocolate positioning and z-index layering to keep the chocolate visible in early phases and manage layering during bite/chew. However, the diff also includes broad, unrelated visual/theme CSS additions (romantic OKLCH palette and background utilities) that were not requested and may violate the constraint to keep visuals unchanged beyond what is necessary for chocolate visibility.

hallucinated_features.description: Global romantic OKLCH color palette and extensive theme variable changes (background/foreground/primary/secondary/etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to fix chocolate visibility/layering in the teddy animation while keeping the rest of visuals unchanged; broad palette/theme changes are not requested and may constitute unintended visual changes.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded 'romantic-bg' utility with background image and overlay gradient plus multiple romantic text/bg/border utility classes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-10 and may change the Surprise view/UI appearance beyond what is necessary to render the chocolate correctly.
